participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, enjoys solitary activities but values meaningful connections.
participant_1.background: I do not have a relationship with my deadbeat dad. I want to visit Rome, but I cannot make myself go alone. I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses. I flirted with the DMV officer in order to pass my driving exam. The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Extroverted and active, loves meeting new people and staying fit through various activities.
participant_2.background: I exercise every day. I am a social butterfly. I like to swim. I am in college.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out.
Cool, same here. I'm trying to decide what to do with my day.
Well, what are your options?
I could go for a walk, but it's so hot outside.
I know, it's really gross today.
I could also go swimming, but I don't have a pool.
There's a public pool in the park, you could go there.
I didn't know that. I might go check it out.
You should, it's really nice.
Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. What do you do for fun?
I like to read, write, and go for walks.
Those are all great hobbies. I like to exercise, swim, and hang out with my friends.
Those sound like fun things to do. I don't have a lot of friends, so I'm not really a social butterfly.
That's okay, you don't need a lot of friends to have fun.
Yeah, but it's nice to have people to do things with.
I know what you mean. I have a small group of friends, but we're really close.
That's great. I'm glad you have such a good group of friends.
Thanks. I'm glad you're not a social butterfly either. I'm not really comfortable around people like that.
That's okay. I'm not really comfortable around people in general.
Well, I'm glad we're friends.
Me too.
